20045000.Original_Text: 너무한 거 아냐. 하나가 없어? 어떻게?
20045000.English_Text: For real? You don't have even one? How?
20045000.Chinese_Text: 太过分了。一个都没有？怎么可能？

20045002.Original_Text: 아이고, 깜짝이야! 갑자기 말을 걸어서 놀랐잖아요.
20045002.English_Text: Oh, what a surprise! You startled me.
20045002.Chinese_Text: 哎哟，吓死我了！突然跟我说话会吓到我。

20045003.Original_Text: (뭔가 큰소리를 지르고 계셔서\n무슨 일이 있나 싶어서 말을 걸었다고 한다)
20045003.English_Text:
I approached you to see what's up.
You seemed agitated.
20045003.Chinese_Text:
（表示看到你大声叫喊，
所以想知道发生了什么事）

20045004.Original_Text: 제가요? 또 그랬어요? 이 습관 어떻게 고치지... \n이러다 상전 비밀도 막 다 말하는 거 아닌지 모르겠네.
20045004.English_Text:
Was I being too loud again? How am I going to fix this habit?
I might as well shout out all my secrets.
20045004.Chinese_Text:
我吗？我又叫喊了？不知该如何改掉这个毛病...
这样下去恐怕会连商廛的秘密都给说出去。

20045005.Original_Text: 근데 지금 그게 중요한 게 아니란 말이에요.
20045005.English_Text: Well, that's not what's important right now.
20045005.Chinese_Text: 可现在重要的不是这件事。

20045006.Original_Text: 절 믿고, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥대지</>는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>영인이</>한테 맡긴다는 식으로...\n지금 기대란 기대는 다 받고 있는데요.
20045006.English_Text:
Trust me, it's like I'm leaving all of <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Land</> to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Youngin</>...
I guess I should have expected all this.
20045006.Chinese_Text:
请相信我，就当成把东部森林的事全交给温英仁吧...
因为现在所有人都对我充满期待。

20045007.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥대지</>, 썩고 말라서 전부 태워버려야 할\n이 빌어먹을 곳에는 돈 될 게 없어요.
20045007.English_Text:
This cursed <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Land</> has nothing of value.
We'd be better off burning down the whole forest.
20045007.Chinese_Text:
这个干枯腐烂东部森林应该全都被烧掉，
一点都没有可以赚钱的方法。

20045008.Original_Text: 뭐 어떻게 찾아내든 만들어 내든 해야죠.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>수수께끼 벌판</>으로 탐사 갑니다!
20045008.English_Text:
Well, I'll have to find it or make it.
Let's explore the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Riddle Plain</>!
20045008.Chinese_Text:
不管是寻找还是制作，必须成功。
去迷之原野看看吧！

20045009.Original_Text: 이것도 인연인데, 시간 되시면 같이 가시죠.
20045009.English_Text: Perhaps us meeting like this is fate. Why don't you join us?
20045009.Chinese_Text: 我们也算缘分一场，有时间就一起去吧。

20045013.Original_Text: (경제적인 가치 같은 건 잘 모르겠다고 한다)
20045013.English_Text: I'm not experienced in judging what's valuable.
20045013.Chinese_Text: （表示不清楚有关经济价值的事）

20045014.Original_Text: 뭐 그야 그렇겠죠...\n상인의 입장에서 보자면 여긴 지옥 같은 곳이라고요.
20045014.English_Text:
Well, I suppose so...
From a merchant's perspective, this place is no better than a prison.
20045014.Chinese_Text:
那很正常...
从商人的角度上来看，这里就像地狱一样。

20045015.Original_Text: (그래도 좀 더 조사가 필요한 게 아니냐 묻는다)
20045015.English_Text: You might need to research some more.
20045015.Chinese_Text: （问是不是需要继续调查一下）

20045016.Original_Text: 뭐, 틀린 말씀은 아니네요.\n어차피 망한 인생... 삽질 한 번 더해보죠. 뭐.
20045016.English_Text:
You aren't wrong.
If we're ruined as it is, we may as well give it another go.
20045016.Chinese_Text:
唔，你说得没错。
反正我的人生已经完了...再做点无用功也无所谓。

20045017.Original_Text: (자신이 도와줄 테니 너무 절망하지 말라고 한다)
20045017.Chinese_Text: （表示自己会帮忙，让他不要太绝望）

20045018.Original_Text: 감사합니다. 덕분에 이것저것 조사할 수 있었어요.
20045018.English_Text: Thank you. I was able to research everything I wanted to.
20045018.Chinese_Text: 谢谢。多亏了你，我进行了很多调查。

20045021.Original_Text: 그나마 땅을 개간하면 가능성이 있을 것 같은데...
20045021.English_Text: There might be a better chance if we clear the land...
20045021.Chinese_Text: 如果能开垦荒地还有一丝希望...

20045022.Original_Text: 이 많은 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</>를 어떻게 하지 않으면 답이 없죠.
20045022.English_Text: But not with all these <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Oduksini</> roaming free.
20045022.Chinese_Text: 但如果不解决这里的大量夜鬼就不会有什么办法。

20045024.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>발발이</>요? 시커멓게 생겨서... 염료라도 뽑을 수 있을까 싶네요.\n뭐 검은색 염료야 흔하디흔하니까요.
20045024.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bulbari</>? They're all black... I don't think they're even good for making dye.
Black dye is all too common, anyway.
20045024.Chinese_Text:
龇牙犬？长得那么黑...不知道能不能制作一点染料。
可黑色染料又不是什么稀奇货。

20045025.Original_Text: 하지만... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>온영인</> 사전에 포기란 없습니다.\n이게 제가 찾은 방법이에요.
20045025.English_Text:
But I'm <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Youngin</>, and I don't know how to give up.
If anything, that's my one redeeming quality.
20045025.Chinese_Text:
但是...温英仁不知道什么叫放弃。
这就是我找到的办法。

20045026.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥대지</>. 내가 너를 태워 없앨지언정\n절대 포기 안 해. 누가 먼저 죽을지 한번 해보자!
20045026.English_Text:
I may end up burning the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Land</> to the ground,
but I just won't call it quits, no matter how long it takes!
20045026.Chinese_Text:
东部森林。我宁可烧掉森林
也绝对不会放弃。看看谁会先死吧！

20045027.Original_Text: 이곳은 인적이 별로 없고 하니\n뭔가 새로운 게 있을 것 같아요.
20045027.English_Text:
There aren't many people around here,
so something interesting might turn up.
20045027.Chinese_Text:
这里人迹罕至，
应该有什么新的事物。

20045028.English_Text: There might be a reason why there aren't many people here.
20045028.Chinese_Text: （说这里应该有人迹罕至的理由）

20045029.English_Text: Good business is always accompanied by risk.
20045029.Chinese_Text: 做生意本来就会有风险。

20045030.Original_Text: 안전한 곳만 다니면서 좋은 물건을 내놓으라고 하면 안 되죠!
20045030.English_Text: You can't expect to find quality goods if you only venture into safe areas!
20045030.Chinese_Text: 不能只去安全的地方或只要求上等的货物！

20045031.Original_Text: 물론 저라고 목숨이 아깝지 않은 것은 아닙니다. \n그래도... 지금은 도전해야 할 시기에요.
20045031.English_Text:
Of course, I don't want to just throw away my life, either.
But... We can't shy away from any challenges.
20045031.Chinese_Text:
当然我珍惜自己的性命。
不过...现在正是进行各种挑战的时候。

20045032.English_Text: I see. I will help you out.

20045033.Original_Text: 감사합니다. \n잡아 주신 거 옆에서 바로 확인해봤어요.
20045033.English_Text:
Thank you.
I'll check what you've brought right away.
20045033.Chinese_Text:
谢谢。
我在旁边确认了你抓到的东西。

20045035.Original_Text: 전혀 특별하지 않아요. 아무것도 없어요.\n이젠 끝이라고요! 포기하는 수밖에 없네요.
20045035.English_Text:
Nothing out of the ordinary. Nothing.
We're done for! We have no choice but to give up.
20045035.Chinese_Text:
一点都不特别。什么都没有。
已经全完了！只能放弃。

20045036.Original_Text: 그냥 선배님들이 깔아 주신 \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</> 물건 공급이나 성실하게 하면 되죠.
20045036.English_Text:
We should just focus on 
transporting goods to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>, which was our superiors’ achievement.
20045036.Chinese_Text:
我只要跟随前辈们，
按部就班地供应风白门的货物就行。

20045037.Original_Text: 그것만 해도 큰 매출과 이익이 꾸준하고 나올 테니...\n뭐 할 필요도 없어요. 사실...
20045037.English_Text:
Even that should be enough to generate some revenue and profit...
We don't need to do anything. It's just...
20045037.Chinese_Text:
只要做这些事就能持续获得很高的销售额和利润...
其实也不需要做什么...

20045038.Original_Text: 야! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>온영인</>, 너 아무것도 하지 마!\n너 뭐 할 때마다 손실만 생겨!
20045038.English_Text:
Hey! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Youngin</>, don't touch anything!
Whenever you do, we always end up losing money!
20045038.Chinese_Text:
喂！温英仁，你什么都不要做！
每次你做什么都会造成损失！

20045039.Original_Text: 그냥 선배들이 시키는 대로\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</> 장사나 하라고!!! 뭐 하려고 하지 말고! 아휴!
20045039.English_Text:
Just do what our superiors told us and focus on the 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</> business! Don’t just try anything on your own!
20045039.Chinese_Text:
你只需要听前辈们的话，
乖乖地做风白门的生意就行！！！别想自己做什么！真是的！

20045041.Original_Text: 흐음... 그래. \n파견 업무 끝나고 온 거야?
20045041.English_Text:
Hmm... Right. 
Are you returning from your dispatch?
20045041.Chinese_Text:
唔...好吧。
你刚做完派遣任务？

20045042.Original_Text: 예, 온 선배님 여기 계신다고 듣고 찾아왔습니다.
20045042.English_Text: Yes, I heard that you were here, so I came to visit.
20045042.Chinese_Text: 是，我听说温前辈在这里就来了。

20045043.Original_Text: 뭘 여기까지 와? 피곤할 텐데...\n간만에 지부에서 좀 쉬지 그랬어.
20045043.English_Text:
You came all the way here just for that? You must be exhausted...
You should've rested at the branch office.
20045043.Chinese_Text:
来这么远的地方做什么？你应该很累吧...
为什么不在支部休息。

20045044.Original_Text: 아무것도 못 찾았거든요...\n침대에 누우려고 했는데 못 눕겠더라고요.
20045044.English_Text:
I couldn't find anything...
I tried to get some rest, but I just couldn't bring myself to relax...
20045044.Chinese_Text:
因为我什么都没找到...
我本来想躺在床上休息，但实在躺不下去。

20045045.Original_Text: 내가 뭘 했다고 이 폭신한 침대에 눕나...\n나 같은 사람이 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>에 어울리긴 하는 건가...
20045045.English_Text:
What did I do to deserve this comfort...?
Does someone like me really fit in with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</>...?
20045045.Chinese_Text:
我有什么资格躺在舒服的床上...
像我这种人适合桃花商廛吗...

20045046.Original_Text: 뭘 그런 말을 해?\n나도 지금 좋은 게 없어서 고민이야.
20045046.English_Text:
Why are you saying that?
I'm worried, too. We still haven't found anything good as of yet.
20045046.Chinese_Text:
干嘛说这种话？
我现在手中也没有什么好的项目，所以很苦恼。

20045047.Original_Text: 저 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</> 들어와서 곧 삼 년이잖아요.\n현재 성과라면 정식 상인은 못 될 거예요.
20045047.English_Text:
I've been working for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> for almost three years now.
At this rate, I'll never become an official merchant...
20045047.Chinese_Text:
我加入桃花商廛已经快3年了。
以现在的成果无法当上正式商人。

20045048.Original_Text: 야! 야! 벌써 그러기야?\n아직 포기하긴 일러. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥대지</> 더 뒤져 보자.
20045048.English_Text:
Hey! Now's not the time for sulking.
It's too early to give up like that. Let's search the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Land</> a little more.
20045048.Chinese_Text:
喂！喂！这么快就说这种话？
现在放弃还太早了。继续在东部森林找找吧。

20045049.English_Text: Have you searched the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Shelter of the Forest</> yet?

20045050.English_Text: Not yet. Shall we go now?
20045050.Chinese_Text:
还没有。那里的鹿很有名...
要不要去那里看看？

20045051.Original_Text: 여기의 괴물들을 조사해서 \n상품 가치가 있는지 알아보려고요.
20045051.English_Text:
I'm trying to see if the monsters 
have any potential economic value.
20045051.Chinese_Text:
我想调查这里的鹿和赤角大鬼，
看看它们有没有商品价值。

20045053.Original_Text: 사실 잘 모르겠습니다.\n있을 것 같았는데 없는 경우가 많았거든요.
20045053.English_Text:
Honestly, I don't know.
There were many cases when I thought there was some potential, but nothing's worked out yet.
20045053.Chinese_Text:
其实我也不清楚。
因为我遇到过很多看似有价值，实际上没有价值的情况。

20045054.Original_Text: 없을 것 같았는데 있는 경우도 드물던데...
20045054.English_Text: It'd make sense for things with real value to be tougher to find than things that might just happen to have some potential...
20045054.Chinese_Text: 看似没有价值，实际上有价值的情况也很少见...

20045055.Original_Text: 맞습니다. \n그래도 이게 마지막 기회라고 생각하고 해보려고요.
20045055.English_Text:
Right. 
I'm going to try one more time. Whenever you try to find something, it's always in the last place you look.
20045055.Chinese_Text:
没错。
不过我还是想把这里当成最后的机会来试一下。

20045056.Original_Text: (자신이 도와줄 테니 좀 더 해보자고 한다)
20045056.English_Text: Why don't you try one last time. I'll help.
20045056.Chinese_Text: （表示自己会帮忙，让他们继续努力）

20045057.Original_Text: 뭐, 틀린 말씀은 아니네요.\n삽질 한 번 더하는 게 뭐 그리 대수입니까?
20045057.English_Text:
Well, you aren't wrong.
It won't hurt to try once more.
20045057.Chinese_Text:
唔，你说得也没错。
再白费功夫也无所谓。

20045059.English_Text:
Well, it's simple, really.
There's nothing really special.
20045059.Chinese_Text:
只有鹿和赤角大鬼而已。
没什么特别的。

20045060.English_Text:
Right... Phew...
Thank you for all you've done.
20045060.Chinese_Text:
是吗...唉...
这段时间谢谢了。

20045061.English_Text: What's the matter? You're acting like we're all done here...

20045062.Original_Text: 이제 사실... 결정 난 거라고 봐도 무방하지 않을까요?
20045062.English_Text: If I'm being honest with myself... Isn't that pretty much clear already?
20045062.Chinese_Text: 可以说...结果已经显而易见了。

20045063.Original_Text: 나나 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>규리</> 씨나 다를 게 없는데... \n내가 운 좋게 좋은 시기에 들어온 것뿐인데...
20045063.English_Text:
There's really no difference between me and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Kury</>... 
I simply joined at the right time.
20045063.Chinese_Text:
我和圭丽没什么不一样...
我只是运气好才进来的...

20045064.Original_Text: 아닙니다. 무슨 말씀 하시는 거예요.\n괜찮습니다. 그렇게 위로하지 않으셔도 됩니다.
20045064.English_Text:
That's not true. You don't know what you're talking about.
It's all right... You don't need to try to comfort me like that.
20045064.Chinese_Text:
不，请不要这么说。
我没事，您不需要这样安慰我。

20045065.Original_Text: 혹시 이번에 정식 발령이 안 나면... \n내가 다른 상전에 갈 수 있게 추천서라도 써줄게요.
20045065.English_Text:
If I don't receive a formal order this time...
I'll write you a recommendation so that you can go to another Merchant.
20045065.Chinese_Text:
如果这次没有成为正式员工的话...
我至少可以在你申请加入其它商廛时帮你写推荐信。

20045066.Original_Text: 말씀만으로도 감사합니다. 큰 도움이 될 것 같습니다.
20045066.English_Text: Thank you for your consideration. It'll be a great help.
20045066.Chinese_Text: 谢谢您的关心。这对我的帮助很大。

20045067.Original_Text: 근데... 상전에서 일하는 게 \n저와 맞는 일인지 좀 더 고민해 보겠습니다.
20045067.English_Text:
But... I should seriously consider
if this work truly suits me.
20045067.Chinese_Text:
不过...我想好好想一下
在商廛工作是否适合自己。

20045069.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>박대비</>님이 관리 역할을 맡고 정하신 규칙입니다.\n어쩔 수 없죠... 성과를 내는 게 상인의 일이니까요.
20045069.English_Text:
It's a rule that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Park Devon</> created after becoming the manager.
I simply can't deny the fact that a merchant has to achieve results.
20045069.Chinese_Text:
这是负责管理的朴防备大人制订的规定。
没办法...做出成果就是商人的职责。

20045070.Original_Text: (그래도 너무한 것 같다며\n혹시 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡</>을 만나면 상황을 전하겠다고 한다)
20045070.English_Text:
Still, it's too much. I'll speak to
Horyong<textColor=[78:148:215:255]></>about the situation when I have the chance.
20045070.Chinese_Text:
（表示个人觉得过于严苛，
遇到郭浩龙时一定会转告情况）

20045071.English_Text: I'll go anywhere if there's quality rock!
20045071.Chinese_Text: 有好石头不远千里都要去！

20045072.English_Text: I'll buy any quality rock, at any time!
20045072.Chinese_Text: 有好石头不问价钱都要买！

20045073.Original_Text: (좋은 돌이 뭐길래 그렇게 뜨겁게 이야기하는지 묻는다)
20045073.English_Text: What's so important about quality rock?
20045073.Chinese_Text: （问好石头究竟是什么，为什么谈起石头这么热情高涨）

20045074.Original_Text: 내가 타고난 천재여서 둘도 없는 수준의 장인이 아닌 이상에야...
20045074.English_Text: Well, unless you happen to be an unrivaled genius of your time...
20045074.Chinese_Text: 除非是与生俱来的天才且具有无与伦比的高超技术...

20045075.Original_Text: 기술은 결국 비슷한 수준에서 수렴이 되더라고.
20045075.English_Text: Eventually, skill can only get you so far.
20045075.Chinese_Text: 最终大家的技术都不会差很远。

20045076.Original_Text: 그럼 뭐야? 돌이야. 좋은 돌이 있어야 좋은 작품이 나온다고!
20045076.English_Text: At that point, the rock itself makes the difference. The quality of the rock decides the quality of the piece!
20045076.Chinese_Text: 那么重要的是什么？是石头。只有好石头才能诞生出好作品！

20045077.Original_Text: 쓰레기 돌로 작품을 만들 사람도 있겠지.
20045077.English_Text: There are those who can create masterpieces with rocks that are typically worthless.
20045077.Chinese_Text: 当然也有人愿意使用垃圾石头进行创作。

20045078.Original_Text: 근데 일단 난 아니야. 그래서 좋은 돌을 찾아다니는 거야.
20045078.English_Text: But I'm not like them. That's why I look for quality rocks.
20045078.Chinese_Text: 但这与我无关。所以我才会四处寻找好石头。

20045080.Original_Text: 말이 좀 통하는군! \n좋은 돌을 보러 갈 건데, 같이 가세!
20045080.English_Text:
Now we're talking! Let's go together 
to the beach to find some good rocks.
20045080.Chinese_Text:
看来我们很谈得来！
我要去海边看好石头，一起去吧！

20045082.Original_Text: 세상엔 돌을 보자마자 그 안의 모양이 보이는 사람도 있다더구먼.
20045082.English_Text: They say there are people who can see the forms hidden inside of rocks as soon as they lay eyes on them.
20045082.Chinese_Text: 听说世上有些人一眼就可以看到石头里面的形状。

20045083.Original_Text: 단지 그 형태가 드러나도록 조각하면 작품이 나온다고...
20045083.English_Text: Then, they carve away at the rocks to uncover the hidden sculpture within.
20045083.Chinese_Text: 他们只要把里面的形状雕刻出来就能创造作品...

20045084.Original_Text: 근데 난 그렇진 않고... 결국은 때리고 만져 봐야지 알겠더라고.
20045084.English_Text: Of course, I don't have that kind of talent... I always have to chisel carefully to see what's inside.
20045084.Chinese_Text: 但我无法做到那种事...只能采用触摸或敲打等方式。

20045086.English_Text: Could you protect me from the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>mutants</> in the area?
20045086.Chinese_Text: 可以从周围变异者的手中保护我吗？

20045087.Original_Text: 그사이에 한번 확인해 보겠네.\n나의 손에 있는 정과 망치로!
20045087.English_Text:
I'll get some work done while you do that.
With this chisel and hammer here in my hands!
20045087.Chinese_Text:
我会趁机确认一下。
利用我手中的锤子与钉子！

20045088.English_Text: So, how do you like the rock?

20045089.Original_Text: 내가 정말 점잖은 사람인데... 욕하고 싶을 정도야!
20045089.English_Text: I'm usually a well-mannered man... but, dang! I'd like to toss out some strong language right about now!
20045089.Chinese_Text: 我是个很斯文的人...可是现在很想骂人！

20045090.Original_Text: 와우! 너무 좋네. 오우... \n여기 석공들 모아두면 오우 막 입에서 욕이 어휴!
20045090.English_Text:
Wow! It's perfect. Oh...
If we got all the stonemasons here, they'd be swearing up a storm, too!
20045090.Chinese_Text:
哇！真棒。哎哟...
把这里的石匠全部聚集到一起的话，不自觉地就会骂出声来！

20045091.English_Text: Why would you feel the need to swear if the rock is so perfect?

20045092.Original_Text: 어우 답답하네. 그게 있어. 돌이 너무 좋을 때...
20045092.English_Text: It's hard to explain, but there's this feeling I get when the rock is just so good...
20045092.Chinese_Text: 真郁闷。是这么一回事，石头质量非常好的时候...

20045093.Original_Text: 그냥 좋은 말로는 표현하기 쉽지 않을 정도의 만족감?
20045093.Chinese_Text: 可以说有一种无法言喻的满足感？

20045094.Original_Text: 그냥 갓 증류한 독주를 그대로 목에 넘기고 싶은 기분?
20045094.English_Text: It's like when you're gulping down an ice-cold alcoholic drink.
20045094.Chinese_Text: 想一口喝下刚蒸馏好的烈酒的感觉？

20045096.English_Text: What? Why is a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> Member coming this way?
20045096.Chinese_Text: 什么？为什么搜阳队员会往我们这边过来？

20045097.Original_Text: 수고 많으십니다. 여기는 많이 위험한 곳입니다.
20045097.English_Text: Good day, sir. This place is dangerous, you know.
20045097.Chinese_Text: 辛苦了。这里是非常危险的地方。

20045098.Original_Text: 안전한 곳으로 자리를 옮겨 주시기 바랍니다.
20045098.English_Text: I would like to request that you move somewhere safer.

20045099.Original_Text: 그래서 도와줄 사람 데리고 왔어요. 됐죠?
20045099.English_Text: That's why I've brought someone to help me. Isn't that enough?
20045099.Chinese_Text: 所以我带来了帮手，这样就可以了吧？

20045100.Original_Text: 그건 알겠습니다만, 더 이상 여기 머무르시면 안 됩니다.
20045100.English_Text: We understand that, but you shouldn't stay here.

20045101.Original_Text: 아! 이 사람이... 한참 기분 좋은데 왜 이래!\n내가 돌 좀 만지다 가겠다는데...
20045101.English_Text:
Argh! I'm in a really good mood now, so why are you ruining it?
I need to spend more time with these rocks...
20045101.Chinese_Text:
唉！这个人...毁掉了我的好心情！
我只不过想摸一会石头就走而已...

20045103.Original_Text: 아니. 위험하면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에서 기지라도 만들어서!\n안전하게 만들어야 할 거 아냐?
20045103.English_Text:
If it's that dangerous, set up a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> base here!
Wouldn't that make the area safer?
20045103.Chinese_Text:
真是的！既然这么危险，搜阳就应该建立基地！
让这里变得安全不是吗？

20045104.English_Text: We're currently waging war against the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blueskins</> in the south.
20045104.Chinese_Text: 我们正在南部地区与青人族进行战争。

20045105.Original_Text: 이렇게 후방에 대원을 배치할 여유가 없습니다.
20045105.English_Text: We don't have enough men to deploy this far back.
20045105.Chinese_Text: 实在是没有余力把队员部署在后方。

20045106.English_Text: Do you know how much money <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Steel</> pays to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>?
20045106.Chinese_Text: 你知道金庚哲门每年交多少钱给搜阳吗？

20045107.Original_Text: 건방진 녀석들이... 누구 돈으로 군복 입는지 알기나 해?\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</> 돈 없었으면 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</> 원정 유지도 못 했어.
20045107.English_Text:
How dare you? Do you know who pays for your uniforms?
If it wasn't for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>'s money, you couldn't even afford the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</> expedition.
20045107.Chinese_Text:
一群放肆的家伙...你们知道自己是用谁的钱穿上了军装吗？
若没有四虎的钱，你们根本无法继续进行海越大陆远征。

20045108.English_Text: I'll be leaving soon with them.
20045108.Chinese_Text: （表示很快就会带着这个人离开）

20045110.Original_Text: 나 흥분 안 했어. 그냥 논리적으로 화가 난 거야.
20045110.English_Text: I don't need to calm down. I have every reason to be angry.
20045110.Chinese_Text: 我没有激动。我只是理性地发怒而已。

20045111.Original_Text: 돈은 엄청나게 받아먹으면서 \n이런 거 하나 처리 못 하는데 화가 나? 안 나?
20045111.English_Text:
Think about all the money they get,
and they can't lend even a bit of a hand? Shouldn't I be angry?
20045111.Chinese_Text:
收那么多钱，
却无法处理这么一点小事？你说气不气人？

20045112.English_Text: Okay, I get it. You need to put the hammer down.
20045112.Chinese_Text: （表示已经明白，让他放下手中的锤子）

20045113.English_Text: Do they believe the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> to be some sort of charity...?
20045113.Chinese_Text: 这些家伙是不是把四虎当成冤大头了...

20045114.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>만 이런 게 아니라니까?\n저기 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>탁회암 협곡</> 쪽에 가면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>원 있거든?
20045114.English_Text:
It's not just <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Steel</>.
Go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Tectite Valley</>, and you'll find those <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom</> members.
20045114.Chinese_Text:
而且不仅是金庚哲门！
梅花团团员就在那边浊灰岩高原路上。

20045115.Original_Text: 가서 한번 만나서 이야기 좀 들어봐.
20045115.English_Text: Go and meet them, and listen to their story.
20045115.Chinese_Text: 你去跟那个人说说话吧。

20045116.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>? 엉망이야! 완전 개들이 노는 공터 같은 곳이야.
20045116.English_Text: The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>? They're a joke! They're like a bunch of big babies over there.
20045116.Chinese_Text: 搜阳？简直一团糟！完全就像野狗玩耍的空地一样。

20045117.English_Text:
I'll go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Tectite Valley</>.
You should return to your <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>research site</>.
20045117.Chinese_Text:
（表示自己会去浊灰岩高原路，
让他回到研究地）

20045118.Original_Text: "그래, 내 걱정은 하지 말고 가서 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>청수국</>을 만나봐.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>호수석</>이 추천했다고 하면 알 거야."
20045118.English_Text:
Right, don't worry about me, and just go meet <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Chun Sukun</>.
He'll understand if you tell him <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ho Susok</> recommended you.
20045118.Chinese_Text:
好，别担心我。快去见“青水菊”吧。
只要说胡水石介绍的，她就会明白。

20045119.English_Text: Are you <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Chun Sukun</> of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom</>?
20045119.Chinese_Text: （问对方是不是梅花团的青水菊）

20045120.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ho Susok</> of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Steel</> sent me here.
20045120.Chinese_Text: （表示自己是金庚哲门的胡水石介绍而来。）

20045121.Original_Text: 아, 그 사람? 좀 싫은데...\n근데 그래서요?
20045121.English_Text:
Oh, that man? I don't care for him much, if I'm being honest.
And you're here for?
20045121.Chinese_Text:
啊，那个人？让人有些不太情愿呢...
你有什么事？

20045122.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>으로부터 제대로 지원을 받지 못한다는 \n이야기를 들었다고 한다)
20045122.English_Text:
I've heard you haven't received <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>proper support from the </>Sol Seekers
.
20045122.Chinese_Text:
（表示听说梅花团没有得到 
搜阳的支援）

20045123.Original_Text: 맞아요. 근데 애초에 별로 기대를 안 했어요.
20045123.English_Text: That's true, but I never expected anything in the first place.
20045123.Chinese_Text: 没错。不过我们从一开始就没有什么期待。

20045124.Original_Text: 지금 탐사대도 지원 없이 우리끼리 해보고 있는데... 좀 힘드네요.
20045124.English_Text: We've been handling things ourselves without any help from the expedition. It hasn't been easy.
20045124.Chinese_Text: 现在的探查队也没有得到支援，全靠我们自己。

20045125.Original_Text: 괜찮으시면 저랑 같이 가서 좀 도와주실래요?
20045125.English_Text: If it's all right, could you come and help us?
20045125.Chinese_Text: 周围环境并不理想，大家都很辛苦。

20045126.English_Text: Let's move to the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dragonhead Cape</> after taking care of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blueskins</>.
20045126.Chinese_Text: 如果方便的话，可以跟我一起去帮忙吗？

20045127.English_Text: There's no end to the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</>.

20045128.Original_Text: 맞아요. 나름대로 최선을 다했지만 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>만으로\n여기 기지 건설을 못 할 것 같아요.
20045128.English_Text:
That's right. We've tried our best on our own<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>to build a base here, but it's beyond the capabilities of us </>Plum Blossom
.
20045128.Chinese_Text:
是的。虽然我们已经竭尽了全力，
但仅靠梅花团无法在这里建设基地。

20045129.Original_Text: 어떻게 겨우 짓더라도 유지를 못 할 것 같구요.
20045129.English_Text: Even if we were able to build it, we can't maintain it.
20045129.Chinese_Text: 即使建成也无法维持下去。

20045131.Original_Text: 제가 묻고 싶네요. 좋은 방법이 없을지?\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</>은 끊임없이 여길 습격해 오는데...
20045131.English_Text:
I should be asking you that.
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</> keep attacking this place without any sign of letting up...
20045131.Chinese_Text:
我也想问有没有什么好办法。
苍盗团不断袭击这里...

20045132.Original_Text: 이 정도에서 포기하는 게 맞을 것 같아요.
20045132.English_Text: It might be best if we just give up here.
20045132.Chinese_Text: 看来现在也只能放弃了。

20045133.English_Text: Have you discussed this with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>?

20045134.Original_Text: 해봤죠. 지금 내는 금액의 두 배를 내라고 하더라고요.
20045134.English_Text: I did, but they asked for double the payment.
20045134.Chinese_Text: 当然有过。但他们说让我们交出双倍金额。

20045135.Original_Text: 뭐, 사실 두 배 내라고 했을 때 낼 마음도 있었는데...\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</> 둘 이외엔 별로 관심이 없어서요.
20045135.English_Text:
Actually, I really was considering paying double...
However, nobody was interested, apart from the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Steel</>.
20045135.Chinese_Text:
其实，他们要求双倍金额时我们也有意接受...
但除了梅花团与金庚哲门以外都不怎么感兴趣。

20045136.Original_Text: 결국 각자 알아서 잘해보자는 식으로 끝났어요.
20045136.English_Text: So, in the end, we decided that we should help ourselves.
20045136.Chinese_Text: 最终的结论就是各行其是。

20045137.English_Text: (I should just nod since I have nothing to say.)

20045138.English_Text: Do you plan to withdraw immediately?

20045139.Original_Text: 철수해야 하는데... 그게 합리적인데...\n왜 난 미련을 버리지 못하는 걸까?
20045139.English_Text:
It's only logical to withdraw...
But I still have lingering regrets.
20045139.Chinese_Text:
应该撤离...那是最合理的选择...
可我为什么还是放不下呢？

20045140.Original_Text: 여기 오면 하고 싶은 게 많았는데...
20045140.English_Text: I had so many things I wanted to do when I came here...
20045140.Chinese_Text: 我本来想在这里做很多事...

20045141.Original_Text: 뭐 하나 제대로 탐사한 것도 없어.\n이럴 거면 왜 오자고 한 거야!
20045141.English_Text:
Not a single expedition was done properly.
Why did we come all the way out here?
20045141.Chinese_Text:
可是最后连一件探查都没有完成。
既然如此，当初为什么要选择来这里！

20045142.English_Text: Are you going to at least try building a base?

20045143.Original_Text: 아니요. 너무 위험하고 성공해도 기지를 유지하기 어려울 거예요.
20045143.English_Text: No. It's too dangerous. Even if we built one, we couldn't maintain it.
20045143.Chinese_Text: 不。那样太危险，而且即使成功建成，也很难维持下去。

20045145.Original_Text: 이제 빠져야죠... \n그래도 억울해서 그냥은 못 나가죠.
20045145.English_Text:
We should withdraw...
But I can't leave without doing something.
20045145.Chinese_Text:
是时候撤离了... 
但我咽不下这口气，不会这么简单地离开。

20045146.Original_Text: 나중에라도 대응해야 할 테니... \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</> 장비 조사를 좀 해야겠어요.
20045146.English_Text:
We'll need to respond later...
We should investigate the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</>' gear.
20045146.Chinese_Text:
反正迟早都要对付苍盗团... 
来调查一下苍盗团装备吧。

20045148.Original_Text: 예! 처음에 올 때 계획에 비하면 보잘것없지만...\n매번 성공할 수는 없죠.
20045148.English_Text:
Thank you! This falls short of our original goal...
But we can't always succeed.
20045148.Chinese_Text:
是！虽然远远比不上最初的计划...
但毕竟无法每次都获得成功。

20045149.Original_Text: 뭐 여기 와서 얻은 정보도 별로 없지만...\n이거라도 보고서를 만들어 올려야겠어요.
20045149.English_Text:
We haven't been able to get much information here.
Even so, I should still make a report about this.
20045149.Chinese_Text:
虽然来到这里之后没能获得多少情报...
至少应该提交这个报告书。

20045150.Original_Text: 예산이 빠듯한 상태에서\n제가 우겨서 탐사한 건데...
20045150.English_Text:
It's an expedition that I urged everyone to carry out,
even though we had a tight budget...
20045150.Chinese_Text:
我们的预算很紧，
都是我执意要来探查的...

20045151.Original_Text: 이제와서 보면... 바보 같았네요.\n그냥 포기할 걸...
20045151.English_Text:
Looking back now, I see I was foolish.
I should've given up sooner...
20045151.Chinese_Text:
回头再看...我真是太傻了。
当初放弃该有多好...

20045152.English_Text:
The place was like a white elephant.
At least we were able to withdraw without many losses, thanks to you.
20045152.Chinese_Text:
这个地方真是个积累。
多亏了你，我们把损失控制在了最小范围。

20045154.English_Text: I don't know why the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</> came here.
20045154.Chinese_Text: 不知道苍盗团为什么会来这里。

20045155.Original_Text: 그래도 이렇게 정리한 자료가 \n앞으로 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</> 대응에 도움이 되면 좋겠네요.
20045155.English_Text:
I hope the report I wrote
helps in dealing with the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</>.
20045155.Chinese_Text:
希望这次整理的资料 
会在未来对付苍盗团时提供一些帮助。

20045156.Original_Text: 이 이상의 정밀 조사를 위해선\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</> 단독으로는 좀 힘들 것 같아요.
20045156.English_Text:
It'll be really hard to come up with a more detailed report
if it's up to those of us in <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom</> alone.
20045156.Chinese_Text:
以梅花团一己之力
恐怕无法进行更多仔细的调查。

20045160.Original_Text: 근데 딱히 연계해서 같이 조사할 곳이 없다는 게 문제네요.
20045160.English_Text: The problem is that we have no one to investigate together with.
20045160.Chinese_Text: 问题在于没有什么可以继续调查的地方。

20045161.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>! Wait!
I've been looking for you!
20045161.Chinese_Text:
<myHero.name/>！请等一下。
我一直在找你。

20045163.Original_Text: 아니... 그게... <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>에서 보고 들은 이야기를\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡</>님께 전달할 거라는 이야기를 들었습니다. 사실입니까?
20045163.English_Text:
Well... It's just that... I heard you were going to deliver what you've heard from <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>
 to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</>
. Is that true?
20045163.Chinese_Text:
哦...那个...我听说你要把在海越大陆的见闻
转告郭浩龙大人。是真的吗？

20045164.Chinese_Text: （表示这是因为受到了郭浩龙的委托。）

20045165.Original_Text: 그러니까... 아직은 제가 제대로 처리 못 한 일도 있고\n약간 급한 부분도 있다고 해야 할까요?
20045165.English_Text:
So... Maybe you wouldn't mind if I let you know about some things I haven't finished
and some urgent matters that need attention?
20045165.Chinese_Text:
应该说...我还有一些事没处理好，
而且多少也有着急的部分。

20045166.Original_Text: 요령이 없는 사람이라서 부족한 부분이 많기도 하고요.
20045166.English_Text: There are a lot of areas in which I'm lacking, since I just don't have the experience.
20045166.Chinese_Text: 我经验不足，所以有很多缺点。

20045168.Original_Text: 간단하게 말씀드리자면... \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡</>님께 더 정제된 이야기를 전달하는 게 좋을 것 같아서요.
20045168.English_Text:
Simply put...
I believe <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</> needs a more detailed report about what happened.
20045168.Chinese_Text:
简单地来讲... 
希望你跟郭浩龙大人说得精简一点。

20045169.Original_Text: (어떤 의미인지 알겠다고 하고,\n자신이 알아서 전달하겠다고 한다)
20045169.English_Text:
I understand what you mean.
I'll deliver it myself.
20045169.Chinese_Text:
（表示明白这是什么意思，
说自己会看着办）

20045171.Chinese_Text:
（互相问候之后 
转告这段时间发生的事情）

20045172.Original_Text: 아... 그래? 음... 생각할 부분이 많군.\n맞네. 현재 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>이 제대로 된 역할을 하지 못하고 있구먼.
20045172.English_Text:
Is that so? There's a lot to think about.
You are correct. Currently, the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> are not operating as they should.
20045172.Chinese_Text:
啊...是吗？唔...看来需要考虑很多事情。
没错。桃花商廛目前没有起到应有的作用。

20045173.Original_Text: 다른 일이 있었다는 건 핑계에 불과해.\n내가 내 할 일은 제대로 하지 못했다는 것을 인정하겠네.
20045173.English_Text:
Something did happen, but that's just an excuse.
I admit that I didn't do my job properly.
20045173.Chinese_Text:
需要顾及其他事情只不过是借口。
我承认自己没有做好分内的事情。

20045174.Original_Text: 대비... 이 녀석을 어떻게 가르쳐야 좋을까?\n제대로 된 사람으로 만들어야 하는데...
20045174.English_Text:
Devon... How should I teach this one?
I need to make a proper person out of him...
20045174.Chinese_Text:
防备...该如何教这家伙呢？
我希望把他成为一个优秀的人...

20045175.Original_Text: (자신이 할 말은 없는 것 같다고 한다)
20045175.English_Text: I'm in no position to comment on this.
20045175.Chinese_Text: （表示自己没有可以发表的意见）

20045176.Original_Text: 응. 말하기 어려운 내용이겠지. 알아.\n스스로 깨우친다면 제일이겠지만...
20045176.English_Text:
Yes, I think I understand.
It's best if he realizes for himself...
20045176.Chinese_Text:
嗯。我明白有些事情你很难说出口。
如果他能够自己领悟自然最好不过...

20045177.Original_Text: 아쉽게도 그렇게 깨우칠 타입은 아닌 것 같아.\n내가 가서 직접 알려주지 않으면 안 되겠군.
20045177.English_Text:
But unfortunately, he doesn't seem to be the type to figure it out on his own.
I should be the one to tell him personally.
20045177.Chinese_Text:
可惜他不是一个能够自己领悟的人。
只能由我亲手去告诉他。

20045178.Original_Text: 고맙네. 좋은 정보를 많이 알려줘서...\n이 은혜는 나중에 이자 붙여서 갚도록 하지!
20045178.English_Text:
Thank you. Since you've told me such important information...
I will repay this debt with interest added!
20045178.Chinese_Text:
谢谢你告诉了我很多有用的事情...
我日后一定会加倍偿还！

20045179.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>의 사람에게 기대하는 덕목에 대해서\n몇 번 이야기한 적이 있었을 거다.
20045179.English_Text:
I've told you several times about the virtues
that are expected of a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom Merchant</>.
20045179.Chinese_Text:
我跟你也讲过几次
人们对桃花商廛有什么样的期待。

20045180.Original_Text: 단기적으로 적자가 날 수도 있어. \n투자할 때 이걸 손실로 봐선 안 된다.
20045180.English_Text:
We will incur losses in the short term. 
But we mustn't see this as a loss when investing.
20045180.Chinese_Text:
账簿在短期内出现赤字很正常。 
投资的时候不能把赤字视为损失。

20045181.Original_Text: 적자를 죽음보다 싫어하는 것은 \n상인으로서 좋은 자질일 수도 있다.
20045181.English_Text:
Having a hate for debts or deficits
may be an advantageous quality for a merchant...
20045181.Chinese_Text:
作为一个商人，把赤字视为比死亡 
更恐怖的事情也可能是一种优秀的资质。

20045182.Original_Text: 하지만 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>을 맡을 사람은\n단순히 지금만 봐선 안 돼.
20045182.English_Text:
However, the person who will be in charge of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</>
must not only focus on the present.
20045182.Chinese_Text:
但是将来领导桃花商廛的人
不能把目光放得太短。

20045183.Original_Text: 더 길게 보고, 더 크게 보는 사람이기에\n많은 사람을 이끌 수 있는 거다.
20045183.English_Text:
Only the one who looks further into the future, with a wider perspective,
will be the one who commands us all.
20045183.Chinese_Text:
只有看得更远，更广才能成为
领导众人的商廛老板。

20045184.Original_Text: 그런 말씀 마십시오. \n제가 어찌 그런 역할을...
20045184.English_Text:
Don't tell me something like that. 
How could I ever fulfill such a role...?
20045184.Chinese_Text:
请不要说这种话。 
我怎么可能成为商廛老板...

20045185.Original_Text: 저같이 그릇이 작은 사람에게 \n그런 일은 당치도 않습니다.
20045185.English_Text:
Such an important role doesn't 
sound right for someone like me.
20045185.Chinese_Text:
像我这种微不足道的人 
不适合承担那种重任。

20045186.Chinese_Text:
我总有一天会死。 
四虎也会陆续离开人世。

20045187.English_Text:
I need someone to take care of the
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> even after my passing.
20045187.Chinese_Text:
当我死后，还有四虎不在的时候，
需要有人领导桃花商廛及各个团体。

20045188.Original_Text: 널 보니... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>을 키우다 무리해 \n건강을 해쳤던 선대인이 기억나는구나.
20045188.English_Text:
You remind me of the former leader who gave up his health and worked tirelessly to grow the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</>
.
20045188.Chinese_Text:
看着你...让我想起了为了使桃花商廛发展 
而不顾自己健康的前任商廛老板。

20045189.Original_Text: 선친의 이름에 먹칠을 하고 있어 부끄럽습니다.
20045189.English_Text: I'm ashamed that I bring dishonor to his name.
20045189.Chinese_Text: 我的所作所为有辱先父之名，深感羞愧。

20045190.Original_Text: 널 잘 가르쳐야... 죽고 나서 \n그 친구의 얼굴을 제대로 볼 거 아니겠느냐.
20045190.English_Text:
I will only be able to face my friend
in the hereafter if I manage to teach you well.
20045190.Chinese_Text:
只有好好教导你...我才会在 
死后有脸去见故友。

20045192.Original_Text: (이렇게 위험한 곳에 왜 혼자 있냐고 묻는다)
20045192.English_Text: Why are you alone in a dangerous place like this?
20045192.Chinese_Text: （问为什么一个人在这么危险的地方）

20045193.Original_Text: 제가 그동안 입으론 위험을 무릅쓰느니 마느니 했는데요.
20045193.English_Text: I always talk about taking risks and whatnot.
20045193.Chinese_Text: 我过去一直只是嘴上说愿意承担风险。

20045194.Original_Text: 곰곰이 생각해보니까 안전한 곳에 서서\n손만 흔들고 있었던 거였습니다.
20045194.English_Text:
But come to think of it,
I never really took any real risks, didn't I?
20045194.Chinese_Text:
但仔细想过之后发现自己
只是在安全的地方挥挥手而已。

20045195.Original_Text: 위험 감수하는 척만 한 거예요.\n아주 안전한 곳에서요.
20045195.English_Text:
I was only pretending to take risks.
I just stayed in my comfort zone.
20045195.Chinese_Text:
我只是假装承担风险而已。
在非常安全的地方。

20045196.English_Text: You already tried many new things.

20045197.Original_Text: 그동안 흑자는 유지하는 선에서 한두 개 시도해본 거죠.\n지금 와서 보면 소극적이었습니다.
20045197.English_Text:
I only attempted one or two things, so long as it didn't hurt profits.
I realize now that I was too passive about it.
20045197.Chinese_Text:
以前只是在保持不亏的前提下，进行过一两次新的尝试而已。
现在看过去的我非常消极。

20045198.English_Text: Profit is the most important thing for a merchant, isn't it?
20045198.Chinese_Text: （问对商人来说盈利不是很重要）

20045199.Original_Text: 맞죠. 중요하죠. 근데 그거 하나 지키려고 아무것도 못 한 겁니다.
20045199.English_Text: It's important, but you're limiting yourself if you're only protecting what you already have.
20045199.Chinese_Text: 没错，确实很重要。但我为了这一个目标没有做成任何一件事。

20045200.Original_Text: 새롭게 매출원을 발굴하고,\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥대지</>에 많은 상인이 필요하다는 걸 증명하려고요
20045200.English_Text:
I'm going to discover a new source of income,
and prove that the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Lands</> need a lot of merchants.
20045200.Chinese_Text:
我要发掘新的商品，
让人们明白<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>閟玉大地</>需要更多商人。

20045201.English_Text:
It's not just for <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jang Kury</>.
It's also about me.
20045201.Chinese_Text:
并不仅仅是因为…<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>张圭丽</>。
这也是为了我自己。

20045203.English_Text: Well, it certainly hasn't been easy.

20045204.Original_Text: 제가 상인으로서 보는 눈이 없는 것인지...
20045204.English_Text: Maybe I'm not that great of a merchant, after all.
20045204.Chinese_Text: 我可能是没有作为商人的眼光…

20045205.Original_Text: 정말 아무 곳도 없는 곳에서\n헛된 일을 하는 것인지 모르겠네요.
20045205.English_Text:
Everything we're doing out here, where nothing good can be found,
might just be a waste of time.
20045205.Chinese_Text:
我不知道自己是不是在
什么都没有的地方白费功夫。

20045206.English_Text:
If it's all right with you... 
Could you escort me to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Ruin</>?
20045206.Chinese_Text:
如果方便的话…
可以一起去一趟<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>閟玉废墟</>吗？

20045208.Original_Text: 저도 그렇게 생각합니다.\n지금까지 들어가지 않았던 이유가 있었죠.
20045208.English_Text:
I think it is, too.
It's one of the reasons I didn't try to go there.
20045208.Chinese_Text:
我也这么认为。
这也是至今都没有去过的理由。

20045209.Original_Text: 그래도 뭐라도 끝까지 해보지 않으면\n스스로 납득할 수 없을 것 같습니다.
20045209.English_Text:
But if I don't try my best until the end,
I won't be able to forgive myself.
20045209.Chinese_Text:
但如果不去尝试的话，
我无法原谅自己。

20045210.English_Text: I couldn't obtain an intact core.

20045211.Original_Text: 아... 모두 가루 혹은 파편이군요.\n이거라도 가져가서 정밀히 조사해보겠습니다.
20045211.English_Text:
Ah, it's all powder or just fragments.
Still, I'll have these taken and inspected thoroughly.
20045211.Chinese_Text:
啊…全都是粉末或碎片。
我可以先对这些进行精密调查。

20045212.Original_Text: 어쨌든 손에 쉽게 넣을 수 없는 물건이니만큼\n다른 가치가 발견될지도 모릅니다.
20045212.English_Text:
Since it's not easy to obtain,
we might discover some hidden value in it.
20045212.Chinese_Text:
不管怎样，这些也是难以入手的东西，
也许会发现其他意想不到的价值。

20045213.Original_Text: (만약에 가치가 발견되어도\n이후에 핵을 계속 구할 방법이 있냐고 묻는다)
20045213.English_Text:
Is there a way to get the core next time
even if the fragments have no value?
20045213.Chinese_Text:
（问如果发现利用价值，
以后打算如何继续获得核）

20045214.Original_Text: 비용보다 가치가 높다면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>에 요청을 해서라도\n어떻게든 해볼 수는 있겠죠.
20045214.English_Text:
If the value is greater than the cost, I'll have to ask the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>
for help.
20045214.Chinese_Text:
如果价值比成本更高，
尽管考虑请求<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>，也会找出方法。

20045216.Original_Text: 이렇게 큰 도움을 주셨는데...\n이런 분위기가 되어 버렸네요.
20045216.English_Text:
You've helped me so much.
And now the situation ended up like this.
20045216.Chinese_Text:
你给了这么大的帮助…
事情却变成了这样。

20045217.Original_Text: 이제 겨우 두 번 해본 겁니다. 포기 안 해요.\n적자가 나더라도 계속할 겁니다.
20045217.English_Text:
We've tried only twice, so I won't give up.
I'll continue, even if it incurs a loss.
20045217.Chinese_Text:
我这才尝试了两次。我绝对不会放弃。
即使出现赤字也会继续下去。

20045218.Original_Text: 예전에 저 정식 상인으로 발령받았을 때\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡</> 상전주님이 해주신 말씀이 있어요.
20045218.English_Text:
There was something Master 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</> told me when I was first dispatched as an official merchant.
20045218.Chinese_Text:
以前我成为正式商人时，
商廛老板<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>郭浩龙</>曾对我说过这样的话。

20045219.Original_Text: 잘하는 상인이 있으면 손해 보더라도\n계속 시도하라고 한다!
20045219.English_Text:
If he sees a good merchant,
he'll tell him to never give up!
20045219.Chinese_Text:
如果有会做事的商人，
即使亏损也要继续尝试！

20045220.Original_Text: 자리에 앉아서 장부나 보고 있으라고 하진 않는다!
20045220.English_Text: He won't keep merchants who just sit around and stare into their account books!
20045220.Chinese_Text: 绝对不让对方只坐在桌子前捣鼓账簿！

20045221.Original_Text: 그 말을 잊고 장부의 숫자만 보고 살았습니다.\n계속 시도해서 여기가 적자가 나더라도...
20045221.English_Text:
I forgot those words and lived all my life staring at numbers in a book.
Even if I lose money here trying this...
20045221.Chinese_Text:
我忘记了这句话，只顾着看账簿上的数字…
即使继续尝试之后还是只有赤字…

20045222.Original_Text: 그래서 제가 그 책임을 지게 되더라도...\n저는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>의 상인으로서 행동할 겁니다.
20045222.English_Text:
And even if I have to pay the consequences...
I will act the way a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom Merchant</> is supposed to.
20045222.Chinese_Text:
所以即便需要我来承担责任…
我也作为一个<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>桃花商廛</>的商人将履行其职责。

20045223.English_Text: No... Sohyup, what's going on here?

20045224.Original_Text: (자신이 묻고 싶은 말이라고 한다.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥대지</>엔 무슨 일로 온 건지 묻는다)
20045224.English_Text:
(He says he wants to ask. 
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile land</> asks what happened)
20045224.Chinese_Text:
“（他说他想问。
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>沃土</>问发生了什么）”

20045226.Original_Text: (무슨 한숨을 그리 크게 쉬는지 묻고\n고민이 있다면 말하라고 한다)
20045226.English_Text:
(Ask why he sighs so loudly 
 and tell him if he has any concerns)
20045226.Chinese_Text:
“（问他为什么这么大声地叹气
并告诉他是否有任何顾虑）”

20045227.Original_Text: 아직 극비사항입니다만...\n소협에게라면 말씀드려도 괜찮을 것 같습니다.
20045227.English_Text:
It's still a top-secret matter... 
 I think it's okay to tell Sohyup.
20045227.Chinese_Text:
“这仍然是绝密的事情......
我认为告诉Sohyup是可以的。”

20045228.Original_Text: 일단 여긴 귀가 많으니 자리를 옮기시죠.\n혹시 시간 괜찮으십니까?
20045228.English_Text:
First of all, you have a lot of ears here, so please change your seat. 
 Do you have time?
20045228.Chinese_Text:
“首先，你这里有很多耳朵，所以请换个座位。
你有时间吗？”

20045229.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>하름</>님. 아니지... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>하름</>, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문주가 죽은 건 \n내외부에 극비로 하고 있었습니다.
20045229.English_Text: By <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>. No... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> The death of Munju is a top secret inside and outside was doing
20045229.Chinese_Text: 通过 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>。 不... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> 文珠之死在内外都是绝密 正在做

20045230.Original_Text: 그리고 그와 동일하게 지금부터 말씀드리는 건\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 내에서도 극비입니다.
20045230.English_Text:
And the same thing I'm going to tell you from now on 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> is a top secret.
20045230.Chinese_Text:
“从现在开始我要告诉你的事情也是一样，
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> 是最高机密。”

20045231.English_Text: (He said he would keep the secret)

20045232.Original_Text: 지난번에 절 믿고 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>하름</>의 처리를 맡겨주신 것에 대해서\n앞으로도 은혜를 잊지 못할 것입니다.
20045232.English_Text: I will never forget your grace for trusting me last time and entrusting you with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>.
20045232.Chinese_Text: “我永远不会忘记你上次信任我并将<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>委托给你的恩典。”

20045233.Original_Text: 그런 만큼 당연히 그걸 잘 해내야 마땅한데...
20045233.English_Text: “Of course, you have to do it well…”

20045235.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>하름</>의 목숨이 끊어진 것을 확인하고,\n그 이후 매장까지 마쳤습니다.
20045235.English_Text:
Confirming that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>'s life has passed away, 
 and then the burial has been completed.
20045235.Chinese_Text:
“<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</> 确认她的生命已经逝去，
 从那时起埋葬已经完成。”

20045236.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</>의 경비가 삼엄한 곳이라서\n문제가 없을 것이라 생각했습니다.
20045236.English_Text:
I thought <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> would have no problems 
 as they are a high-security area.
20045236.Chinese_Text:
“<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> 的安保很严密
，所以我认为这不会有问题。”

20045237.Original_Text: 어느 날 비명소리를 듣고 그곳으로 갔는데\n경비병은 모두 당했고, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>하름</>의 시체는 사라진 후였습니다.
20045237.English_Text:
One day I heard a scream and went there
 all the guards were killed, and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>'s body was gone.
20045237.Chinese_Text:
“有一天，我听到一声尖叫，然后去了那里
所有的守卫都被杀了，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</> 的尸体不见了。”

20045238.Chinese_Text:
“（惊讶地问 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</> 的尸体 
 是否消失了）”

20045239.Original_Text: (이곳이라면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>하름</>의 시체 실종에\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</>이 개입된 게 아니겠느냐 묻는다)
20045239.English_Text:
(In this case, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</>'s disappearance 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Spears</> did not intervene?
20045239.Chinese_Text:
“（在这种情况下，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</> 的失踪 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spears</> 没有介入？问） ”

20045240.English_Text:
You mean <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Changdodan</>? 
They have no reason to take <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</>'s body.
20045240.Chinese_Text:
“你是说<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>长岛</>？
他们没有理由带走<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</>的尸体。 ”

20045241.Original_Text: 그리고 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>침입자</>들은 매우 치밀해서\n별다른 증거물을 남기지 않았습니다.
20045241.English_Text:
And the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>intruders</> were so dense
 they left no evidence.
20045241.Chinese_Text:
“而且<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>入侵者</>如此密集
他们没有留下任何证据。”

20045242.Original_Text: 그런 점에서 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</>의 소행이라고\n생각하긴 어려울 것 같습니다.
20045242.English_Text:
In that sense, it seems difficult to think that it is the work of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Changdodan</>
.
20045242.Chinese_Text:
“从这个意义上说，似乎很难将其视为 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Changdodan</>
 的作品。”

20045243.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</>에도 섬세한 작업이 가능한 자가\n있을 지도 모르는 거 아니냐고 한다)
20045243.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>It is said that there might be someone in the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>spear group</> who can do delicate work
)
20045243.Chinese_Text:
“（<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>据说<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>长岛</>中可能有人可以做精致的工作
）”

20045244.Original_Text: 맞습니다. 소협의 말씀을 듣고 보니...\n제가 너무 성급하게 결론을 내렸군요.
20045244.English_Text:
That's right. After hearing Sohyeop's words...
I've come to a conclusion too hastily.
20045244.Chinese_Text:
「是啊。听了素赫的话……
我下定论太仓促了。」

20045245.Original_Text: 그럼 혹시 모르니 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</>의 정보를\n더 수집해 봐야겠습니다.
20045245.English_Text:
Then, just in case you don't know, I'll try to collect 
 more information from <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Changdodan</>.
20045245.Chinese_Text: “那么，以防万一你不知道，我会尝试从 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Changdodan</> 收集更多信息。”

20045248.Original_Text: 이제부터 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</>을 공격할 것이다.\n넌 은밀히 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</> 주변에서 단서를 찾도록 해라.
20045248.English_Text: From now on, I will attack <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spears</>.
20045248.Chinese_Text: “从现在开始，我将攻击<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spears</>。让我们找到它。”

20045252.Original_Text: 여기 있습니다. \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</>이 지키고 있던 서편을 가져왔습니다.

20045253.English_Text:
Yes? What is it? 
 Read it.

20045255.English_Text:
'On the darkest day, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Vice </>head
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>to the lair of calamity</>
20045255.Chinese_Text:
“'在最黑暗的一天，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>副</>head
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>前往灾难的巢穴</>”

20045256.English_Text:
'Help the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>carrier</>
 so that the transport is unobstructed!'
20045256.Chinese_Text:
“'帮助 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>carrier</>
 确保运输畅通无阻！'”

20045257.Original_Text: (정중히 요청한다고 적었는데...\n별로 정중한 말투는 아닌 것 같다)
20045257.English_Text:
(I wrote that I was asking politely...
 I don't think it's very polite)
20045257.Chinese_Text:
“（我写道我是礼貌地询问......
我认为这不是很有礼貌）”

20045258.Original_Text: 귀빈? 귀빈은 아마 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>하름</>을 의미하는 거겠지.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>재앙의 은신처</>인가... 거긴 왜... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>운반자</>는 또 뭐지?
20045258.English_Text:
Visitor? Vip would probably mean <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</>.
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Hideout of Disaster</>
20045258.Chinese_Text:
“访客？贵宾可能意味着 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</>.
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>灾难藏身处</> ...以及为什么...还有什么是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>载体</>？”

20045259.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도하</>! 네가 먼저 가서 상황을 확인하도록 해라!
20045259.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Doha</>! Make sure you go first and check the situation!

20045261.Original_Text: 소협, 도와주셔서 감사했습니다.\n저희는 장소를 옮겨 계속 추적을 진행하겠습니다.
20045261.English_Text:
Sohyup, thanks for your help.
We'll move on to keep the chase going.
20045261.Chinese_Text:
“Sohyup，谢谢你的帮助。
我们会移动位置并继续跟踪。”

20045262.English_Text:
(If it doesn't get in the way 
 says he'll go with him)
20045262.Chinese_Text:
“（如果不碍事，
 说他会和他一起去）”

20045266.Original_Text: 저도 이제 막 도착한 상태입니다.\n먼저 도착한 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>대원</>을 불러 보겠습니다.
20045266.English_Text:
I have just arrived.
I'll call the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Crew</> who arrived first.
20045266.Chinese_Text:
“我刚到。
我会打电话给先到的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>船员</>。”

20045270.English_Text: I searched all over the place...

20045272.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도하</>. 너는 저기 높은 곳으로 올라가 넓게 확인해 보아라.\n근처는 나와 소협이 찾아보겠다.
20045272.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Doha</>. You go up there and check it wide.

20045278.English_Text: (They change places and keep looking for them)

20045279.English_Text: Yes. Then let's go right away.

20045281.Original_Text: 그러시군요. 저도 마찬가지입니다.\n단지 신경 쓰이는 부분이 있었는데...
20045281.English_Text:
You are right. Me too. 
 There was only one thing that bothered me...
20045281.Chinese_Text:
“你说得对。我也是。
 只有一件事困扰着我......

20045282.Original_Text: 전에 비해 적들이 날카롭지 않다고 할까...\n뭔가 힘이 빠진 듯한 느낌을 받았습니다.
20045282.English_Text:
I think the enemies aren't as sharp as before...
I felt like something was missing.
20045282.Chinese_Text:
“我觉得敌人不像以前那么锋利了……
我觉得少了点什么。”

20045283.English_Text:
(Ask if something has anything to do with this case 
)

20045284.Original_Text: 아뇨, 그건 아닙니다. 그냥 잊어주십시오.\n아마 제 착각인 것 같습니다.
20045284.English_Text:
No, it's not. Just forget about it.
Maybe I'm mistaken.
20045284.Chinese_Text:
“不，不是。忘记它吧。
也许我弄错了。”

20045289.English_Text: No. He said he saw <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</> alive.
20045289.Chinese_Text: “没有。他说他看到 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</> 还活着。”

20045290.Original_Text: 살아 있다고? 그럴 리가...\n어떤 사람이냐? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>그를 목격했다는 자</>는...
20045290.English_Text:
He's alive? Could it be...
Who is that? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Whoever saw him</>...
20045290.Chinese_Text:
“他还活着？难道是...
那是谁？<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>谁看到了他</>...”

20045291.Original_Text: 얼굴 보시면 누군지 아실 겁니다.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>날개 사냥 집결지</>에 계시니 가보시죠.
20045291.English_Text:
You'll know who you are by looking at your face. 
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>You're at the Wing Hunting Rally</>, let's go.
20045291.Chinese_Text:
“看你的脸就知道你是谁。
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>你在Wing Hunting Rendezvous</>，我们走吧。”

20045294.Original_Text: 이렇게 다시 뵙는군요.\n오늘은 무슨 날인지 다양한 분들을 뵙네요.
20045294.English_Text:
It's nice to see you again.
I see a lot of people today for whatever day it is.
20045294.Chinese_Text:
“很高兴再次见到你。
不管今天是什么日子，我都会见到很多人。”

20045296.Original_Text: 예, 만났다기보단 마주쳤다고 해야 하겠네요.\n목례를 드렸는데... 아무런 반응이 없으셔서...
20045296.English_Text: Yes, I should say we met rather than met.
20045296.Chinese_Text: “是的，我应该说我们是见面而不是见面。

20045297.Original_Text: 원래 그리 살가운 분은 아니셨다고 생각해서\n딱히 별생각은 없었습니다.
20045297.English_Text:
Originally, I thought he wasn't that kind of person, so I didn't really think much of it 
.
20045297.Chinese_Text:
“本来，我觉得他不是那种人，所以也没多想
。”

20045299.Original_Text: 저기 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥 발굴지</> 쪽으로 향하시던데요.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>불마자</>라도 없애실 생각이신 걸까요?
20045299.English_Text: He was heading towards <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertilizer Dig</> over there.
20045299.Chinese_Text: “他正朝那边的 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertilizer Dig</> 走去。？”

20045300.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>They suggest we go to the Fertilizer Dig</>)
20045300.Chinese_Text: “(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>他们建议我们去肥料挖掘场</>)”

20045301.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도하</>! 네가 가서 먼저 확인해 보도록 해.
20045301.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Doha</>! You should go check it out first.

20045303.Original_Text: 오! <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>발굴지</> 쪽으로 가신다면 \n저도 같이 가도 될까요?
20045303.English_Text:
Oh! If you go to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Excavations</> 
Can I go with you?
20045303.Chinese_Text:
“哦！<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>如果你去挖掘现场</> 
我可以和你一起去吗？”

20045304.Original_Text: 안 그래도 연구 중인 게 있어서요.
20045304.English_Text: I still have something I'm researching.

20045305.English_Text: I'm going to move out of here.

20045306.English_Text: (It's a dangerous place, but I ask if it's okay)
20045306.Chinese_Text: “（这是一个危险的地方，但我问是否可以）”

20045307.Original_Text: 괜찮습니다. 여기엔 말이죠!\n다른 곳에서는 발견할 수 없는 게 있거든요.
20045307.English_Text:
It's ok, here it is!
Because you can't find it anywhere else.
20045307.Chinese_Text:
“没关系，就在这里！
因为你在别处找不到它。”

20045308.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>균열의 기운</>이 한곳에 엄청나게 뭉쳐 있는,\n그런 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>굉장한 곳</>이 있습니다!
20045308.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>There is such a <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Awesome place</> where <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>The energy of the rift</> is so clustered in one place!
20045308.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>有这样一个<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>很棒的地方</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>裂痕的能量</>就这么聚集在了一处！”

20045309.English_Text:
“As a researcher, you have to take some 
 risk.”
20045309.Chinese_Text:
“作为一名研究人员，你必须承担一些
风险。”

20045310.Original_Text: (이곳은 매우 위험한 곳이라서\n추천은 하기 어렵다고 한다)
20045310.English_Text:
(This is a very dangerous place 
 it is difficult to recommend)
20045310.Chinese_Text:
“（这是一个非常危险的地方
很难推荐）”

20045311.Original_Text: 알고 있습니다.\n그래서 안에 들어가진 않고 주변만 연구 중이에요.
20045311.English_Text:
I know.
So I'm not going inside, I'm only researching the surroundings.
20045311.Chinese_Text:
“我知道。
所以我不进去，我只是在研究一下周围的环境。”

20045312.English_Text: (Then I tell you to take care of yourself)

20045313.English_Text:
Sohyup. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Doha</> seems to have found the traces of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>.
Go right away
20045313.Chinese_Text:
“Sohyup。<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Doha</> 似乎找到了<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>的踪迹。
马上去！ ”

20045314.English_Text:
This is it!
I found traces of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</> here.
20045314.Chinese_Text:
“就是这样！
我在这里发现了 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</> 的痕迹。”

20045315.English_Text: (He said to go in and check it right away)

20045318.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Doha</> daewon 
 he said it would be a great help)

20045319.Original_Text: 안은 위험하다. \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</>를 지휘할 사람 일부는 남는다.
20045319.English_Text:
It's dangerous inside. 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> is left with some.
20045319.Chinese_Text:
“里面很危险。
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> 还剩下一些。”

20045320.English_Text: Then I'll go in instead of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Oreum</>.

20045321.Original_Text: 아니... 이 일은 내가 책임진다.\n그리고 약속하지. 반드시 돌아온다고.
20045321.English_Text:
No... I'm responsible for this.
And I promise. I'll definitely come back.
20045321.Chinese_Text:
“不……我对此负责。
我保证。我一定会回来的。”

20045324.English_Text: Here it is. I can feel the energy of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>
20045324.Chinese_Text: “就是这里。我能感受到<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>的能量”

20045326.Original_Text: 아마 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>이곳 어딘가</>에 숨어 있을 겁니다.\n그리고 우릴 습격할 틈을 노리고 있겠지요.
20045326.English_Text:
It's probably hiding <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>somewhere</> here.
And he's looking for an opportunity to attack us.
20045326.Chinese_Text:
“它可能藏在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>某处</>这里。
他正在寻找机会攻击我们。”

20045328.Original_Text: 느껴지는 기운의 크기를 보아...\n이미 완전히 회복이 끝난 것 같습니다.
20045328.English_Text:
Looking at the magnitude of the energy you feel...
It seems that you have already fully recovered.
20045328.Chinese_Text:
“看你感受到的能量大小……
看来你已经完全恢复了。”

20045329.English_Text: No... I think I'm stronger than the last time.

20045330.English_Text:
I'm sorry... but I'm backing out. 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>As the person responsible for Ereda</>...
20045330.Chinese_Text:
“对不起……但我要退一步了。
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>作为艾瑞达的负责人</>……”

20045331.Original_Text: 전 이곳에서 살아 돌아가야 합니다.\n비겁하게도 말이죠.
20045331.English_Text:
I have to live here.
 Cowardly.

20045334.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Oreum</> is silent because I can't think of anything to say)
20045334.Chinese_Text: “(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Oreum</> 沉默了，因为我想不出什么要说的了)”
